errorModal.title: Error in the application
errorModal.description: It seems that an error has occured in the app.

userAdded.title: User correctly added
userAdded.description: The user {{ name }} has been created on the endpoint with the ID {{ id }}.

userEdited.title: User correctly updated
userEdited.description: User with ID {{ id }} has been modified on the endpoint with name {{ name }} and date of birth {{ date | translocoDate }}.
